snippet: Franck Bohbot, a French photographer living in New York, photographed several barbershops in the city during the past year. “You feel that so many stories happened there,” he said.
abstract: Franck Bohbot, a French photographer living in New York, photographed several barber shops in New York City throughout 2014.
lead_paragraph: Franck Bohbot, a French photographer living in New York, photographed several barbershops in the city during the past year. “You feel that so many stories happened there,” he said.
